duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching alongside the Restaurant Leader for all restaurant employees.
Oversee the restaurant condition and ensure compliance with company policies & procedures as well as Health Department Standards.
Ensure proper preparation, presentation, and freshness of all foodservice products.
Use P&L and store reports to affect change.
Read and interpret documents such as operating and maintenance instructions and procedure manuals.
Multi-task, perform repeated bending, standing, and reaching, and lifting up to 50 pounds occasionally.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred, but not required for candidates with at least one year of Restaurant Management experience.
